explanations.reason: The paper focuses on the survival and sustainable development of small- and medium-sized tourism and hospitality enterprises in Macao, analyzing factors like competitive advantage and regional soft environment. The methodologies used include exploratory factor analysis, confirmatory factor analysis, variance analysis, regression analysis, and structural equation analysis, none of which are related to machine learning or any of the specified keywords. The study does not involve any machine learning techniques, neural networks, or related concepts.
